casebody.data:
No. 132,

Original.

Alabama, et al., Plaintiffs v. North Carolina. 562 U.S. 1176, 131 S. Ct. 1035,

178 L. Ed. 2d 823,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 718. January 18, 2011.

Motion of Special Master for allowance of fees and reimbursement of expenses is granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $6,312.50 for the period July 1, 2010, through December 31, 2010, to be paid equally by the parties.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
